description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Frankystein is a platforme game.Guide professor X to collect all bones to reconstruct the skeleton of Frankie. You must take the skeletons flashing first.
description.short: Frankystein is a platforme game.Guide professor X to collect all bones to reconstruct the skeleton of Frankie. You must take the skeletons flashing first.
